column1: NGR is from 1950s record sheet. The gauge was moved in 1921 and there is no information on the distance or direction. The description of the original location togethrr with its altitude suggests it might have been 300 yards East at about SN843733
The gaps in the records are for bracketed readings that have been removed along with the respective annual total
1932 and 1945 totals are bracketed but none of the monthly readings are and the totals equal the sum of the monthly readings. Annual totals left in the record
